questions.question: Considering the woven pattern and overall structure, what is the primary material composing the sofa's frame?

Focusing on the texture of the wicker frame, would you describe its surface as smooth or rough?
Considering the number of distinct seating sections, how many individual people can comfortably sit on this?
What is the shape of the main sofa structure, ignoring the cushions?
Looking at the cushions, what is their general shape?
Describe the pattern visible in the wicker frame; is it uniform or varied?
What seems to be the texture of the cushions; are they smooth or textured?
Examining the overall color scheme, is it monochromatic or multicolored?
Considering the style, would you classify this sofa as modern or traditional?

Does the sofa's design incorporate any distinct or noticeable decorative elements beyond its basic form?
